summary: UNSAFE DESIGN FEATURE DEALING WITH THE HEADLIGHT AND DASH SYSTEM ON 1998-2004 AUDI AUTOMOBILES.  *MR  THE AUTOMATIC ACTIVATION OF THE DASH LIGHT IN LOW LIGHT SITUATIONS WITHOUT ANY CORRESPONDING ACTIVATION OF THE HEADLIGHTS.  THE FEATURE MADE THE DRIVER THINK  THE HEADLIGHTS WERE ON.  *SCC   *JB
